root.name: EA Sports Active 2.0
root.description: OverviewEA Sports Active 2.0's primary draw is its integration with the Kinect hands-free controller. EA has said that this version of the game will track "true" 1:1 motion, with navigation features and workouts with gestures and voice using the Kinect controller. On the PS3 and Wii, the game comes with special wireless motion sensor straps that attach to the leg and arm. Each version of the game also includes a heart rate monitor. It will ship with 70 new exercises and activities, conditioning programs, mini-fitness challenges, and a full 9-week workout program. The Xbox 360 and PS3 versions will also receive new workouts and exercises from their respective digital storefronts.
